org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections

Class ReadGroupArgumentCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.argumentcollections.ReadGroupArgumentCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ReadGroupArgumentCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Picard AddOrReplaceReadGroup arguments, except library, sample name, read group description and program group.
    See Also:
